roles.name: Advocate
roles.description: Register, View/Manage Cases, Add Clerks, View Application Status.

roles.name: Advocate Clerk
roles.description: Assist Advocates, Access Assigned Case Files.

roles.name: Approver
roles.description: Approve/Reject Registrations, Add Remarks for Rejections, View Registration Details.

roles.name: System
roles.description: Auto-approve Litigants, Generate IDs, Trigger Notifications.

roles.name: Super User
roles.description: Super User. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.
